info.name: Collabora Online
info.description:
Collabora Online allows you to to work with all kinds of office documents directly in your browser.
This application can connect to a Collabora Online (or other) server (WOPI-like Client). ownCloud is the WOPI Host. Please read the documentation to learn more about that.
You can also edit your documents off-line with the Collabora Office app from the **[Android](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.collabora.libreoffice)** and **[iOS](https://apps.apple.com/us/app/collabora-office/id1440482071)** store.
info.summary: Edit office documents directly in your browser.
info.author: Collabora Productivity based on work of Frank Karlitschek, Victor Dubiniuk
